data.name: PluginGenerator.TemplateNotSet
data.value: No plugin code generation template has been specified. You need to create a Scriban template for the code generator to work. For more information please visit https://rezanid.github.io/xrmtools/docs/howto/write-a-plugin-template

data.name: PluginGenerator.TemplateFileNotFound
data.value: The template file not found. It might have moved to another location. Please make sure that you have set the right template and try again. Missing file: {0}
